testcaseName: # 2 Pentacel at 7 yrs; # 1 at age ≥ 12 mo.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered Pentacel, as the second dose of the DTaP vaccine, at age 7 years and a first dose at greater than 12 months of age, that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was missing and child is in catch-up.  Past Due Date added to align with Recommended Date.
